code: ## Load the packages needed library(adobeanalyticsr) library(tidyr) ## needed for some of the data wrangling library(jsonlite) ## Will help in visualizing calculated metrics definitions  aw_auth('oauth')  ##Check to make sure you have been logged into the correct account profile get_me()   company_id <- 'adobea8cf' rsid <- 'igeo1xxpnwcidadobepm'  ## Create a segment to be used farther down in the demo #create the segment rule segment_rule <- seg_rule(dimension = 'mobiledevicename',                          verb = 'exists')  #build the segment and capture the segment id seginfo <- seg_build(name = 'NON Desktop traffic',                       description = 'This is a segment that filters out everything that is not associated with an identified mobile device',                       rules = list(segment_rule),                       create_seg = T) segid <- jsonlite::fromJSON(seginfo)$id

text: update name description simple adding within list function updates argument. “Test Calculated Metric” “new name” “Test cm description” “new description” updating existing calculated metrics within definition complex solution needs done. cm_update_complete$definition$formula$col1$func [1] “mean” cm_update_complete$definition$formula$col1$description [1] “Mean”
code: ?cm_update  cm_updated <- cm_update(   id = cm_no_seg_filter,   updates = list(name = "new name",                  description = "this is a new description"),   locale = "en_US",   debug = FALSE,   company_id = company_id ) # Name Change c(`old name` =  jsonlite::fromJSON(cm_obj)$name,`new name` = cm_updated$name)  # Description Change c(`old description` =  jsonlite::fromJSON(cm_obj)$description,`new description` = cm_updated$description) old name                           new name old description                       new description cm_updated <- aw_get_calculatedmetrics(filterByIds = cm_updated$id,                                         expansion = 'definition')  #change the col1 values to reflect a new function `mean` cm_updated$definition$formula$col1$func <- 'mean' cm_updated$definition$formula$col1$description <- 'Mean' cm_updated$definition$formula$col1$`include-zeros` <- FALSE  cm_update_complete <- cm_update(   id = cm_updated$id,   updates = jsonlite::unbox(cm_updated),   locale = "en_US",   debug = FALSE,   company_id = company_id )

text: CRAN release: 2022-01-03 Added support JWT Authentication aw_auth() aw_auth_with() aw_auth_name() aw_auth_path() Added support aw_token() function life-cycle warning Added new function called aw_segment_table() returns one multiple segments corresponding metrics Cleanup edits aw_freeform_table() function Token support updates api call functions. Removed client_id client_secret functions using variables even defined arguments. Fixed bugs around api calls returned NA Added argument aw_freeform_table() function prevent metric dimension validation check run start every function call. save users small amount time significant long run. Added progress bar aw_freeform_table() re-calibrated estimated finish time. Enhanced authorization retention saving client ID client secret session environment Killed global counter short requests Removed search clause restriction enable “CONTAINS” understood default aw_freeform_report() search arguments. Added search argument recursive call Updated date_range argument handle datetimes better
